cmp: 乙 ("B" (in a sequence of examples involving "A", "B", "C", etc.)/2nd heavenly stem/2nd in order)
mng: to fade, to wither, to wilt, listless

exm.mng: to wilt, to droop, to appear listless
appearing genuine, but actually nasty or devious, see also 蔫土匪[nian1 tu3 fei3]
scoundrel with an honest demeanor, see also 蔫兒壞|蔫儿坏[nian1 r5 huai4]
